contents.title: Openings for DSE Lab
contents.author: DSE Lab
contents.article:
• 1. DSE is always recruiting PhD students each semester.
  • 2. Candidates are welcome to contact any DSE lab member to gain more information.
  • 3. Candidates should contact Dr. Tang directly if they are interested in joining the DSE lab.
  • 4. How to apply to the Computer Science and Engineering department here at MSU.
